title: I can't log in to any of my lol accounts what do i do
body: I can't log in to any of my lol accounts and i'm 99% sure I got the passwords right. I tried restarting my computer but that didn't help and I don't want to have to delete league and download it again cause that will take a very long time. :\ i dont know what to do

replies.body: We might have had a little hiccup with our login servers earlier. Let me know if you still can't get signed in or not so I can forward this to the right people!
